pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10    $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2 + 7 Poison, 3 + 14 Poison on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() On bee nests (Warm Plains, Warm Forests) $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Flowers     $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Can fertilize plants. Afterward, they create $(item)Honey$() in their $(item)Bee Nests/Hives$().
